name: Monster Play Time: Puzzle Game
description:
Monster Play Time: Puzzle Game is a logic puzzle and horror game. You should solve different riddles and outsmart the scary monster! Switch the platforms, control the buttons and use levers to get to the exit!

In Monster Play Time: Puzzle Game all you must do is to control both your power hands in correct order to make everything work! Solve puzzles fast and try not to get into scary monster hands. Good luck!

Why you’ll love the scary puzzle game:

- Lots of puzzles and logic riddles
- Easy controls and cool graphics
- Smart exciting gameplay

Control power hands and solve logic puzzles! Play the puzzle game for free!
